resources.string: Enter a title for the session and click \'Create\'.
Click the button to start the session. Click again to start/stop recording each annotation. Use the MENU to stop the session.

Rehearsal Assistant allows you to record voice/audio annotations during an event. Such a documented event is called a session. Click \'Document New Session\' to create a new session and record annotations. You may also click on an existing session to review its annotations, or long-click for more options.
